title: Still unable to launch client?
body: Since about a week ago the riot servers haven't worked for optus users, I was wondering if any of youse have any work arounds besides tethering phone connections? Riot support wasn't too helpful...

replies.body:
My client worked fine last night, this morning won't start up. Same problem?

edit: I'm with iinet.
That was patch 4.21 coming out, the servers were down a bit
You could go through a VPN although I don't know of any that you could use but you could look into that
I've tried a few, none have worked unfortunately..
Ahh that sucks man, Is it 100% the optus thing because it's the first I have heard of it not that I have really been looking out for it
